name: INGetVisualCodeIntentHandling

items.name: func resolveVisualCodeType(for: INGetVisualCodeIntent, with: (INVisualCodeTypeResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the type of code requested by the user.

items.name: func confirm(intent: INGetVisualCodeIntent, completion: (INGetVisualCodeIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Confirms whether you can provide the requested visual code.

items.name: func handle(intent: INGetVisualCodeIntent, completion: (INGetVisualCodeIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Handles providing the image for the specified visual code.
